ValidationRule.description: No Opportunity should be at Closed Won or Signed Contract without having a contract record attached via Chatter
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CASE( StageName, "Signed Contract", 1, "Closed Won", 1, "Billed", 1, 0) = 1, NOT(ContractAttached__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: No Opportunity should be at Closed Won or Signed Contract without having a contract record attached via Chatter
